meanings.definition: Joined or fastened to something else
meanings.sent1: The keys were attached to the keychain.
meanings.sent2: The picture was attached to the wall with tape.
meanings.sent3: The cat attached itself to my leg, wanting attention.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was attached to his presence, like a shadow.
meanings.sent5: The idea of success became attached to his hard work.

meanings.definition: Fond of or feeling a strong connection to someone or something
meanings.sent1: She was very attached to her favorite teddy bear.
meanings.sent2: He felt attached to the old tree in his backyard.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed attached to the idea of chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was so strong, it was as if they were attached at the hip.
meanings.sent5: The memories of childhood were deeply attached to her heart.

meanings.definition: Included with an email or document
meanings.sent1: The file was attached to the email for reference.
meanings.sent2: Please find the document attached for your review.
meanings.sent3: The photo was attached to the message, adding a personal touch.
meanings.sent4: The contract was attached to the message, awaiting your signature.
meanings.sent5: The report was attached to the email, ready for submission.
